signIn.noUsersTwo: Please make sure you have Steam installed and are signed into at least one account, then click refresh.
signIn.acknowledge: By clicking 'Continue', you agree to the <0>Terms of Service</0> and acknowledge that you have read our <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

hero.title: The Only Steam<1/>Automation Tool<1/>You Will Ever Need
hero.subtitle: Farm trading cards, unlock achievements, boost playtime, and automate your Steam experience — all in one tool.

private.message: Unable to retrieve games list. This is usually because:

reason.1: Your profile is set to private
reason.2: Your game details are set to private
reason.3: You have no games in your library
reason.4: You are using an invalid Steam web API key
reason.5: Something is blocking outbound connections (firewall, antivirus, etc)

idlingGames.title: Idling Games
idlingGames.subtitle: Games that you are currently idling will appear here

cardFarming.subtitle: Add games to this list to farm their trading cards

achievementUnlocker.subtitle: Add games to this list to unlock their achievements
achievementUnlocker.addDelay: Add a delay after unlocking this achievement

autoIdle.title: Automatic Idler
autoIdle.subtitle: Add games to this list to automatically idle them on launch

favorites.title: Favorite Games
favorites.subtitle: Add games to this list to easily access them

tradingCards.title: Trading Card Manager
tradingCards.subtitle: Sell your trading cards on the Steam market
tradingCards.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove all active trading card listings from the Steam market?
tradingCards.lockCard: Prevent this card from being listed for sale

cardFarming.progress: Idling <1>{{count}}</1> game(s) with <3>{{total}}</3> total card drop(s) remaining

achievementUnlocker.delay: The next achievement will be unlocked in <1>{{timer}}</1>
achievementUnlocker.scheduleWait: Achievement unlocking paused due to being outside of the scheduled time and will resume again once inside the scheduled time

freeGames.title: Free Games
freeGames.subtitle: When there are free games available for you to claim, they will appear here

gameSettings.globalMaxIdleSub: The maximum amount of time (in minutes) all games should be idled for before stopping (overrides individual game settings)
gameSettings.idleSub: The maximum amount of time (in minutes) this game should be idled for before stopping
gameSettings.dropsSub: The maximum number of card drops to farm for this game before stopping
gameSettings.achievementsSub: The maximum number of achievements to unlock for this game before stopping

achievementManager.alert: Some protected achievements or statistics have been disabled. <1>Learn more</1>

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.modal: Are you sure you want to <1>{{state}}</1> all achievements?

cardFarming.alert: To use the Card Farming feature, please add your Steam Credentials in Settings → Steam Credentials
cardFarming.steamCredentials: Steam credentials are required in order to use the Card Farming and Trading Card Manager features. <1>Learn more</1>

nextTask.description: Run the next task automatically after Card Farming is complete

schedule.description: Specify the time range during which achievements can be unlocked

achievementUnlocker.interval: Unlock achievements randomly every {{min}} to {{max}} minutes

nextTask.description: Run the next task automatically after Achievement Unlocker is complete

tradingCards.alert: To use the Trading Card Manager feature, please add your Steam Credentials in Settings → Steam Credentials
tradingCards.priceAdjustmentSub: Add or subtract <1>{{priceAdjustment}}</1> from the sale price of all sales
tradingCards.sellDelaySub: Wait <1>{{sellDelay}}</1> seconds between listing each card to avoid rate limiting
tradingCards.sellLimitSub: Do not sell items if the final sale price is below <1>{{sellLimitMin}}</1> or above <3>{{sellLimitMax}}</3>

confirmation.logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirmation.resetStatistics: Are you sure you want to <1>reset</1> all statistics?
confirmation.resetSettings: Are you sure you want to reset settings to default?
confirmation.clearData: Are you sure you want to clear all data?
confirmation.steamClosed: Steam is not running. Open the Steam client to continue

modal.moreBenefits: More benefits coming in the future
modal.footer: Prices displayed are in USD and exclude taxes.

toast.mismatch: Account mismatch between Steam and SGI
toast.missingCredentials: Missing card farming credentials in "Settings → Steam Credentials"
toast.outdatedCredentials: Card farming credentials need to be updated in "Settings → Steam Credentials"
toast.enableAllGames: Add some games to your card farming list or enable "all games" in "Settings → Card Farming"
toast.noGames: There are no games in your list

refetch.cooldown: Games can be refreshed again at {{time}}

stopIdleAll.error: Failed to stop idling all game(s)

apiKey.save: Steam web API key saved successfully
apiKey.error: Unable to validate Steam web API key
apiKey.clear: Steam web API key cleared successfully

resetSettings.success: Settings have been reset to default

tradingCards.noCards: Unable to find any trading cards in your Steam inventory
tradingCards.processing: Processing your request. This might take a second..
tradingCards.emailConfirm: Successfully listed {{count}} card(s) for sale. Confirm the listing via email
tradingCards.mobileConfirm: Successfully listed {{count}} card(s) for sale. Confirm the listing via the Steam mobile app
tradingCards.rateLimit: Rate limited when fetching card prices
tradingCards.noListings: No active trading card listings found
tradingCards.removedListings: Removed {{count}} of {{total}} active trading card listings from the Steam market
tradingCards.failedRemove: Failed to remove active trading card listings from the Steam market
tradingCards.priceOutOfRange: Card price {{price}} is outside of the sell limits ({{min}} - {{max}})
tradingCards.cardLocked: Card is locked and cannot be listed for sale
tradingCards.skippedCards: Skipped {{count}} card(s) that are locked or outside of the sell limits
tradingCards.allCardsLocked: All cards are locked and cannot be listed for sale
tradingCards.allCardsOutOfRange: All cards are outside of the sell limits and cannot be listed for sale
tradingCards.cooldown: Please wait {{cooldown}} seconds before fetching more card prices
